documentation.text: @dev Allows the Somnia reactivity precompile to reason about support for reactivity subscriptions

@notice The Somnia Reactivity Precompile is a privileged contract at a fixed address
 @title SomniaExtensions

@notice Somnia reactivity precompile interface and related data structures
 @title ISomniaReactivityPrecompile
@notice Emitted when a new subscription is created
@notice Emitted when a subscription is removed

@title BlockTickHandler
 @notice Simple handler that emits BlockTick events for off-chain subscriptions

SomniaEventHandler.metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.30+commit.73712a01"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"OnlyReactivityPrecompile","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"emitter","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes32[]","name":"eventTopics","type":"bytes32[]"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"onEvent","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"The _onEvent virtual method must be overriden to define logic executed when subscription callbacks are invoked by the chainThe contract is deemed upgrade safe due to the absense of storage variables","kind":"dev","methods":{"onEvent(address,bytes32[],bytes)":{"params":{"data":"Event data for non-indexed event arguments. May be empty if event only has indexed params","emitter":"Smart contract that emitted the EVM event log(s)","eventTopics":"List of event topics associated with the event (event signature being first param)"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Allows the Somnia reactivity precompile to reason about support for reactivity
